overview: Zazie Skymm gets caught be the teacher smoking. He threatens to tell her parents but she makes the moves on her teach and in the end…he offers to go smoke with his student after they have sex in the classroom. Leyla Bento has to pass her test; her holiday depends on it, as she explains to her teacher. She persuades him in the classroom to pass the test with her mouth and tight pussy…she passes. Aisha (Krisztina Banks) is in trouble because she has a tattoo, Dani Daniels ask to see all of them…there goes Aisha’s school uniform and he she partakes in a threesome…no more tattoos for her. Anina Silk must pass her test or she will be suspended, she is caught on her cell phone, so she seduced the Professor…she passes the real test.
title: Schoolgirls & Teachers 5 - Seducing My Teacher
